original_text: Then the prophet went and he stood beside the road. He was waiting for king Ahab to come. He tied a cloth over his eyes so that the king would not recognize him.
korean_text: 선지자가 가서 수건으로 자기의 눈을 가리어 변장하고 길 가에서 왕을 기다리다가

sentences.original_text: and he stood beside the road
He was waiting for king Ahab to come
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아합 왕이 오기를 기다리고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He tied a cloth over his eyes
so that the king would not recognize him
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그를 알아보지 못하게 하기 위함이었습니다
